process.name: items/show/465
process.xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" name="items/show/465" recordType="Item" itemType="Person" public="0" featured="1">
    <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
      <element name="Title">
        <data>Franz Kafka</data>
      </element>
    </elementSet>
    <extra>
      <data name="tags">writer</data>
      <data name="tags">absurdism</data>
    </extra>
    <record name="files/show/492" recordType="File" file="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7d/Kafka_portrait.jpg">
      <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
        <element name="Title">
          <data>Franz Kafka : portrait</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Creator">
          <data>Atelier Jacobi: Sigismund Jacobi (1860–1935)</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Date">
          <data>1906</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Rights">
          <data>public domain</data>
        </element>
      </elementSet>
    </record>
    <record name="files/show/493" recordType="File" file="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6f/Kafka_statue_Prague.jpg/328px-Kafka_statue_Prague.jpg">
      <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
        <element name="Title">
          <data>Monument to Franz Kafka</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Creator">
          <data>Róna, Jaroslav</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Date">
          <data>statue: 2003</data>
          <data>photo: 2011</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Description">
          <data>Kafka statue in Prague</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Rights">
          <data>Statue: Jaroslav Róna (2003)</data>
          <data>Photo: Myrabella / Wikimedia Commons / CC-BY-SA-3.0</data>
        </element>
      </elementSet>
    </record>
  </record>

process.name: items/show/464
process.xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" name="items/show/464" recordType="Item" itemType="Text" public="0" featured="1">
    <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
      <element name="Title">
        <data>Der Proceß</data>
        <data>English: The Trial</data>
      </element>
      <element name="Creator">
        <data>Kafka, Franz</data>
      </element>
      <element name="Date">
        <data>1925</data>
      </element>
      <element name="Description">
        <data>A man seeks an inaccessible authority.</data>
      </element>
    </elementSet>
    <extra>
      <data name="tags">book</data>
      <data name="tags">classic</data>
      <data name="tags">Czechoslovak Republic</data>
    </extra>
    <record name="files/show/491" recordType="File" file="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/f/f9/TrialKafka.jpg">
      <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
        <element name="Title">
          <data>Franz Kafka : Der Prozess</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Date">
          <data>1925</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Description">
          <data>Front cover art for the book 1st edition</data>
        </element>
        <element name="Rights">
          <data>Verlag Die Schmiede, Berlin, 1925</data>
        </element>
      </elementSet>
    </record>
  </record>

Title: Der Proceß
English: The Trial
Creator: Kafka, Franz
Description: A man seeks an inaccessible authority.

Title: Franz Kafka : Der Prozess
Description: Front cover art for the book 1st edition
